ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.interpolant

Interface Interpolant

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ARKInterpolant, DefaultInterpolant, DormandPrinceInterpolant, RKInterpolant

    public interface Interpolant
    This is the standard interface for an interpolant.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector evaluate_interpolant(org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector y0, org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector y1, org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 theta, org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 dt, java.lang.Object stage_values)
      Evaluates the interpolant.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate_interpolant

        org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector evaluate_interpolant(org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector y0,
                                                                  org.jscience.mathematics.vectors.Float64Vector y1,
                                                                  org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 theta,
                                                                  org.jscience.mathematics.numbers.Float64 dt,
                                                                  java.lang.Object stage_values)
        Evaluates the interpolant.
        Parameters:
        y0 - The solution at the beginning of the step.
        y1 - The solution at the end of the step.
        theta - The fractional distance within the current step to find the dense output.
        dt - The current stepsize.
        stage_values - The stage values for this step when applicable.
        Returns:
        The dense output value at the fraction theta within the stepsize.
